plot: A documentary filmmaker goes to Jerusalem and stays with a friend in the ultra-orthodox Jewish neighbourhood of Mea Sharim. He explores the streets of this private and observant world, meeting a host of interesting characters.
title: Mea Shearim
plot_es: A documentary filmmaker goes to Jerusalem and stays with a friend in the ultra-orthodox Jewish neighbourhood of Mea Sharim. He explores the streets of this private and observant world, meeting a host of interesting characters.
plot_en: A documentary filmmaker goes to Jerusalem and stays with a friend in the ultra-orthodox Jewish neighbourhood of Mea Sharim. He explores the streets of this private and observant world, meeting a host of interesting characters.
